prompt: Using my catalogue 'cleaned_sdss_source.fits' please filter it to only include sources inside my MOC file 'reduced_sdss_moc.fits'.
expected: stilts tpipe in=cleaned_sdss_source.fits cmd='select "inMoc("reduced_sdss_moc.fits", RA, DEC)"' out=sdss_inside_moc.fits

prompt: I want to know if my sources are within or within 0.1 degrees of my MOC `my_moc.fits`. My catalogue is called 'input.fits'.
expected: stilts tpipe in=input.fits cmd='select nearMoc("my_moc.fits", RA, DEC, 0.1)' out=output.fits

prompt: Using my catalogue 'input.fits' please filter it to only include sources inside my MOC file 'my_moc.fits'.
